page.title: 08Employment
page.content: {Eversheds,}a printing firms employing 250 people, was begun in 1876 by Joseph Evershed. They have 17 printing machines and 3 guillotines. {Schweppes has been in St.Albans since the war but the new office, which was built in 1965, deals with the financial department and employs 500 staff.{ {Jeans, ladies hairdressers}owned by Mrs.Pool, employs 6 people.Mondays and Tuesdays are cheap days for old age pensioners. {The Haven Hotel.}It began as a large house. Considerably extended in 1964, has 52 bedrooms, one large reception room, one lounge, one garden and is on 3 floors. Now it is a '4 Roses' luxurious hotel. {Sopwell {House Hotel,}is a top class restaurant and hotel. It was originally a private house.
